thread.title: Investor’s guide: Birla Sunlife Frontline Equity

title: Investor’s guide: Birla Sunlife Frontline Equity
text: Investor’s guide: Birla Sunlife Frontline Equity 19 Jul 2015, 7:59PM IST Copy URL Embed With the market showing signs of edginess, a large-cap fund with a solid track record of delivering across market cycles may just be what the doctor ordered. Birla Sunlife Frontline Equity Fund, an old warhorse, fits the bill well. The fund’s annualised return since its inception in 2002 is an enviable 25 per cent. It has beaten its benchmark, the BSE 200, convincingly by 5-9 percentage points over various time periods. For the latest videos, follow us on twitter Follow @EconomicTimes 85 views
